overview: When a woman attempts to kill her uncaring husband, prosecutor Adam Bonner gets the case. Unfortunately for him his wife Amanda (who happens to be a lawyer too) decides to defend the woman in court. Amanda uses everything she can to win the case and Adam gets mad about it. As a result, their perfect marriage is disturbed by everyday quarrels.
tagline: It's The Hilarious Answer To Who Wears The Pants!
cast: Spencer Tracy|Katharine Hepburn|Judy Holliday|Tom Ewell|David Wayne
